summary: The war exploits of French captain Conan and his men during World War I and during the Allied intervention in the Russian Civil War.
cast: Philippe Torreton|Samuel Le Bihan|Bernard Le Coq|Catherine Rich|François Berléand|Claude Rich|André Falcon|Claude Brosset|Crina Muresan|Cécile Vassort|François Levantal|Pierre Val|Roger Knobelspiess|Frédéric Pierrot|Jean-Claude Calon|Laurent Schilling|Jean-Yves Roan|Philippe Héliès|Tonio Descanvelle|Eric Savin|Olivier Loustau|Jean-Marie Juan|Jean-Christophe Chavanon|Christophe Calmel|J.P. title: Capitán Conan
